name: V_EHI_CVG_COVERAGE_HIST_SUB
description: Filter view for loading coverage history by subscriber as EHI.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the coverage record. This ID may be encrypted if you have elected to use enterprise reportingï¿½s encryption utility.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number used to identify each row of history information for a coverage record.

columns.name: CHANGE_DATE
columns.description: The date on which each change was added to the coverage record.

columns.name: ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value associated with the change made to the coverage record (i.e. Create, Add Member, Change Covered Status, etc.)
